trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_SEQ_00<tab>Varshahn has glad tidings to share.

TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_SEQ_01<tab>Anticipation plain in his voice, Varshahn informs you that both the reinforced warding scales and the artificial Atomos have been completed. Assuming they function as intended, all is now in readiness for your quest to find Azdaja, his sister, in the Thirteenth. Thus do you set off to join your comrades at the Great Work.

TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_SEQ_02<tab>You take stock of the items needed for your journey, and, by way of a surprise, Varshahn is presented with a new vessel better suited for the dangers ahead. You, too, are given a gift of sorts in the form of Hydaelyn's navigational crystal; harboring the power of Light, the relic could well aid you in your mission. With nothing left to discuss, you make your way to Akyaali, where your boat awaits.

TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_SEQ_03<tab>The boat bears you to Alzadaal's Legacy, and you descend into the chamber of the voidgate. There, all gathered watch on with bated breath as Varshahn steps forward to lift the seal.
※In the event that you leave Weaver's Warding, you may re-enter by speaking with the veteran Radiant in Akyaali.

TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_SEQ_04<tab>In the name of Alzadaal III, the voidgate is revealed, and thence enlarged by the Atomos to a size able to accommodate a man. At last, the way is open. Beyond lies a castle swarming with voidsent, and your first task upon arriving will be to deal with any hostile entities.
※To enlist your companion NPCs for this duty, speak with them near the entrance or access Duty Support via the main menu. Use the Duty Finder if you wish to complete the instance alongside fellow players.

TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_SEQ_05<tab>After hurtling through the emptiness of the rift, you emerge in the bowels of the forewarned castle. Its occupants are hells-bent on devouring your aether, and you must fight them off lest your quest come to a premature end.
※In the event that you leave Troia Castle, you may return via Weaver's Warding.

TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_SEQ_06<tab>The battle takes an unexpected turn when the castle's mistress is devoured by a fearsome voidsent named Scarmiglione, but your fellow uninvited guest soon falls by your hand. With the area secured, you and your comrades discuss the next course of action.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_SEQ_07<tab>In your brief time in the Thirteenth, you have been made keenly aware how little you know about voidsent. If you are to survive their world, you must learn their ways.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Y'shtola at the Great Work.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the veteran Radiant.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Varshahn.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_TODO_03<tab>Enter the Fell Court of Troia.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_TODO_04<tab>Enter the Fell Court of Troia.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_001<tab>Ah, excellent timing, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Just a moment ago, I received word from the Ironworks.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_100_001<tab>They have completed their task, and are on their way with the reinforced warding scales.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_002<tab>Similarly, our alchemists have also succeeded in creating an artificial Atomos.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_003<tab>All is in readiness for our journey to the void.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_004<tab>I have instructed our comrades to gather at the Great Work. Let us head there at once.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_100<tab>Our comrades are here, but the Ironworks people have yet to arrive.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_ESTINIEN_000_105<tab>To thus create a voidsent... Hannish alchemists are as clever as they are bold.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_YSHTOLA_000_110<tab>There you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_YSHTOLA_000_111<tab>I present to you the fruits of the alchemists' labor: the artificial Atomos.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_YSHTOLA_000_112<tab>Though we've yet to put it to the proof, its aether is practically identical to that of the original. A truly remarkable feat in so short a time.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_113<tab>Aye, our alchemists have outdone themselves yet again. Small wonder that they are the pride of Radz-at-Han.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_114<tab>I would express my gratitude to Nidhana...but it appears she isn't here.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_YSHTOLA_000_115<tab>She rushed off after bringing the Atomos to attend to a pressing task, but said that she would return ere we set forth.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_YSHTOLA_000_116<tab>Which should be shortly after our friends from the Ironworks arrive with the warding scales...
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_CID_000_117<tab>Did someone say warding scales? Because it just so happens we have them.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_YSHTOLA_000_118<tab>Right on cue. 'Tis good to see you all again.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_YSHTOLA_100_118<tab>But for the president himself to attend... Keen to bear witness to our little experiment, are you?
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_CID_000_119<tab>You know I am. I was there at the Crystal Tower, lest you forget. I wouldn't miss this for the world.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_CID_000_120<tab>You don't mind if we come along and see you off, I hope? It's thanks to these three that we could finish the work so quickly.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_NERO_000_121<tab>'Twas my painstakingly collected data that made the reinforcement possible.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_NERO_000_122<tab>The scales will last a good ten years in the void with nary a hint of degradation.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_BIGGS_000_123<tab>As the ones who did the <var 1A 02 /var>actual<var 1A 01 /var> reinforcing, we guarantee their quality as well. They'll keep you safe.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_WEDGE_000_124<tab>But enough bragging─here are the scales!
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_125<tab>With these, we can search for my sister without fear of corruption. I know not how to repay you.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_CID_000_126<tab>Don't mention it. Midgardsormr came to our rescue in the rift. It's the least we can do to help his children.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_127<tab>Thank you.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_CID_000_128<tab>Well, my friend, my only regret is that I won't be able to accompany you on this latest grand adventure.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_NIDHANA_000_130<tab>Wait!
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_131<tab>Nidhana... Is aught the matter?
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_NIDHANA_000_132<tab>Before you depart, Your Excellency, there is something we wish to present to you.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_NIDHANA_100_132<tab>Will you please come with me?
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_133<tab>You would not delay us without good cause. Very well.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_134<tab>Forgive me, my friends, but I require a moment.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_NERO_000_135<tab>...He's certainly taking his time. What sort of grand present could take so long to receive?
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_CID_000_136<tab>The kind that'll help him in the void, I presume.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_CID_100_136<tab>In that godsforsaken place, he'll need all the help he can get. But you of all people ought to know that, eh?

TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_NIDHANA_000_200<tab>Since the people learned the truth about Master Vrtra, I had been thinking that it would be nice for him to have multiple vessels. This seemed the perfect occasion to create one.

TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_NIDHANA_000_205<tab>While I had help from my fellows, everyone was busy working on the Atomos, and we needed until the very last moment. Alas, a concoction that can extend the hours in a day doesn't exist...yet.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_NIDHANA_000_210<tab>Nevertheless, we managed to complete both an Atomos and a vessel for Master Vrtra that met with our satisfaction!
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_WARRIOR04532_000_220<tab>The satrap and your fellows have already departed for the vault. Are you ready to set forth?
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_SYSTEM_000_221<tab>Proceed to Weaver's Warding?
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_YSHTOLA_000_300<tab>For my research into cross-rift travel, this is a moment of truth. For all those who helped us come this far, let us pray we succeed.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_ESTINIEN_000_305<tab>They've upgraded the vault's guardians to contend with voidsent. A task which was made easier by the surplus of broken units.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_ESTINIEN_000_306<tab>...One could argue that I did them a favor.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_NAHBDEEN_000_310<tab>I must say, I'm beginning to feel nervous!
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_CID_000_315<tab>It's not only us cheering you on, but the alchemists of old too. You couldn't possibly fail.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_NERO_000_320<tab>An undersea vault guarded by alchemical sentries... Such a place would be an ideal proving ground for new creations.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_BIGGS_000_325<tab>Like us, the alchemists have tremendous passion for their work. If we were to collaborate, I reckon we could achieve some great things!
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_WEDGE_000_330<tab>Good gods, but the treasures here! If I were a thief, I wouldn't notice a voidgate if it came and bit me in the rear!
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_A1_000_001<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_A1_000_002<tab>Form a party and enter the Fell Court of Troia.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_YSHTOLA_000_405<tab>True to our friends' words, the warding scales are eminently reinforced. We needn't fear corruption even should we be wounded by voidsent.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_ESTINIEN_000_410<tab>First time in a reflection or no, I can't say I'm feeling nervous. Not after having journeyed to the edge of existence.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_415<tab>No looking back... I shall keep my eyes ever forward, and trust Radz-at-Han to my people.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_NAHBDEEN_000_420<tab>While the voidgate is open, we must remain vigilant. One voidsent past us is one voidsent too many!
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_CID_000_425<tab>Once we've seen you off, we'll take our leave. Wouldn't want to get in the soldiers' way should it come to battle.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_CID_000_426<tab>It'll be dangerous in the void, but you've been there before and returned safely. We have faith you'll do so again.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_NERO_000_430<tab>I expect a comprehensive report upon your return. 'Tis the least I am owed for my invaluable contribution.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_BIGGS_000_435<tab>To create a voidsent to expand a voidgate... It's inspired ideas like this that make the impossible possible!
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_WEDGE_000_440<tab>I'm glad we can see you off properly─unlike when you were abruptly whisked away to the First. Anyway, please be safe!
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_ESTINIEN_000_700<tab>It seems the minions are keeping their distance for now. Let's carry on.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_VARSHAHN_000_705<tab>I never dreamed I would come this far. I can't thank you all enough for your cooperation.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_YSHTOLA_000_710<tab>This castle should serve as a base of operations for now.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_YSHTOLA_000_712<tab>Ere we set our sights elsewhere, let's see what there is to learn here.
TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_SYSTEM_000_713<tab>From this point onward, you will not encounter aetherytes for a while. Should you leave Troia Castle, you may return here via Weaver's Warding.

TEXT_AKTKMI101_04592_SYSTEM_000_714<tab>Additionally, you may now enter the Fell Court of Troia with a party of NPC avatars. To make use of this feature, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trust<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
